name: Future Dusk
meaning: A dark, moody, and intriguing hue, sitting between blue and purple. It speaks to the transition from 2024 to 2025, representing a sense of mystery and escapism into the digital twilight.

name: Aquatic Awe
meaning: A transformative turquoise that celebrates the strange and wondrous aspects of nature, specifically the bioluminescent ecosystems of the deep ocean.

name: Ray Flower
meaning: A radiant yellow inspired by the regenerative power of sunshine. Ray Flower aligns with the growing focus on sustainability and solar energy.

name: Sunset Coral
meaning: A vibrant, cheering coral that bridges the gap between digital vibrancy and natural warmth. Perfect for engaging social interaction.
